language.description: Facebook Comments Plugin for Facebook. Requires a Facebook App id.

specs.title: App Id
specs.description: Specify the Facebook App Id for your website.

specs.title: Widget width
specs.description:
By default the widget is adjusted to the 100% of the container. You can change it here specifying an integer number of pixels or a percentage.
Warning: it may break the template layout.

specs.title: Amount of comments to show
specs.description: Specify the amount of comments to show. Default value: 10.
